mapper.insert: MERGE TB_COMPANY_CARD_MASTER as a USING ( select #{cardUseSeq} as cardUseSeq ) AS b ON a.CARD_USE_SEQ = b.cardUseSeq WHEN MATCHED THEN update set a.COM_CD = #{comCd} , a.CARD_CD = #{cardCd} , a.CALC_DATE = #{calcDate} , a.ERP_COMPANY_SEQ = #{erpCompanySeq}, a.TITLE = #{title} , a.REG_DATE = #{regDate} , a.REG_ERP_EMP_SEQ = #{regErpEmpSeq} , a.REG_USER_ID = #{regUserId} , a.REG_ERP_DEPT_SEQ = #{regErpDeptSeq}, a.REG_EMP_NO = #{regEmpNo} , a.REG_DEPT_CD = #{regDeptCd} , a.LAST_USER_ID = #{lastUserId} , a.LAST_DATE_TIME = getdate() WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN insert ( CARD_USE_SEQ , COM_CD , CARD_CD , CALC_DATE , ERP_COMPANY_SEQ , TITLE , REG_DATE , REG_ERP_EMP_SEQ , REG_USER_ID , REG_ERP_DEPT_SEQ , REG_EMP_NO , REG_DEPT_CD , LAST_USER_ID , LAST_DATE_TIME) values( b.cardUseSeq , #{comCd} , #{cardCd} , #{calcDate} , #{erpCompanySeq}, #{title} , #{regDate} , #{regErpEmpSeq} , #{regUserId} , #{regErpDeptSeq}, #{regEmpNo} , #{regDeptCd} , #{lastUserId} , getdate());

insert into TB_COMPANY_CARD_MASTER_LOG ( TCCML_LOG_SEQ , CARD_USE_SEQ , COM_CD , CARD_CD , CALC_DATE , ERP_COMPANY_SEQ , TITLE , REG_DATE , REG_ERP_EMP_SEQ , REG_USER_ID , REG_ERP_DEPT_SEQ, REG_EMP_NO , REG_DEPT_CD , LAST_USER_ID , LAST_DATE_TIME) select next value for SEQ_TCCML_LOG_SEQ, #{cardUseSeq} , #{comCd} , #{cardCd} , #{calcDate} , #{erpCompanySeq}, #{title} , #{regDate} , #{regErpEmpSeq} , #{regUserId} , #{regErpDeptSeq}, #{regEmpNo} , #{regDeptCd} , #{lastUserId} , getdate()

insert into TB_COMPANY_CARD_MASTER_FILE( CARD_USE_SEQ, FILE_SERL, O_FILE_NAME, M_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, IS_DELETE, LAST_USER_ID, LAST_DATE_TIME) select #{cardUseSeq}, isnull(max(FILE_SERL)+1, 1), #{oFileName}, #{mFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{isDelete}, #{lastUserId}, getdate() from TB_COMPANY_CARD_MASTER_FILE where CARD_USE_SEQ = #{cardUseSeq}

insert into TB_COMPANY_CARD_MASTER_FILE_LOG( TCCMF_LOG_SEQ, CARD_USE_SEQ, FILE_SERL, O_FILE_NAME, M_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, IS_DELETE, LOG_TAG, LAST_USER_ID, LAST_DATE_TIME) select next value for SEQ_TCCMF_LOG_SEQ, #{cardUseSeq}, #{fileSerl}, #{oFileName}, #{mFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{isDelete}, #{logTag}, #{lastUserId}, getdate()
